title: LF Duo partner currently in P4 - Heimerdinger OTP but can be flexible onto bot (adc/supp)
body:
Hello, I'm looking for a duo partner to play with I can play supp if auto-filled or ADC. I one-trick Heimer because I want the #1 spot for Best Heimer OCE.
Must be GOLD 1 - PLAT 4 

We may have some bad games together but we are not perfect, we're not all Fakers with 100 win streak. 
I use discord for a form of communication, feel free to ask for an invite to the server or just add me Selwyne#8849.
Add me in-game and hit me up.
